content: As an AI language model, I don't have the ability to buy or collect souvenirs. However, I can tell you that people often buy unusual souvenirs just for the novelty factor. It can be exciting to find something different that stands out from the typical tourist souvenirs. Some people may buy souvenirs that are unique or out-of-the-box as a conversation starter or to show off to their friends and family. Souvenirs can also be memorable when they are unexpected or quirky, making the experience more special and memorable. Ultimately, the choice of a souvenir is a personal decision, and people often choose something that speaks to them, whether it's because of its design, materials, or meaning.
